prodNameC: 聯信嗜T型淋巴病毒1型和2型抗體酵素免疫診斷試劑盒
indicationsName: 酵素免疫分析法定性測試人體血清或血漿內之嗜T型淋巴球病毒I型、II型抗體。
ingredientsDesc: 2.1ML HTLV-II 弱陽性對照(HTLV-II WEAKLY REACTIVE CONTROL):1 瓶 INACTIVATED HUMAN SERUM CONTAINING HTLV-II ANTIBODIES, SPECIFIC FOR PEPTIDE ANTIGERS. NON-REACTIVE FOR HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN AND AANTIBODIES TO HIV-1/2 CONTAINS PRESERVATIVES: 0.1% SODIM AZIDE AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN. STORE AT 2~8°C.
6.25ML TMB 受質溶液(TMB SUBSTRATE SOLUTON):1瓶3,3',5,5'-TETRAMETHYLBENZIDINE (TMB) DISSOLVED IN CITRATE-PHOSPHATE BUFFER AND H2O2 SOLUTION. STORE AT 2~8°C.

1.1ML HTLV-1強陽性對照(HTLV-1 STRONGLY REACTIVE CONTROL):1瓶 INACTIVATED NORMAL HUMAN SERUM CONTAINING HTLV-I ANTIBODIES. NON-REACTIVE FOR HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN AND ANTIBODIES TO HIV-1/2. CONTAINS PRESERVATIVES:0.1% SODIUM AZIDE AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN. STORE AT 2-8 C.
9.0.4 ML HTLV-I/II 酵素結合物 (HTLV-I/II HRP-CONJUGATE):1 瓶 HORSERADISH PERODIDASE-CONJUGATED GOAT ANTI-HUMAN IGG ANTIBODIES, WITH 0.01 % GENTAMICIN AND 0.05 % 4-DIMETHYLAMINOANTIPYRINE. STORE AT 2~8°C
10.96孔 HTLV-I/II 反應盤 (HTLV-I/II PLATE, 96 WELLS):2 盤 EACH PLATE WELL CONTAINS ADSORBED SYNTHETIC HTLV-I/II PEPTIDES. STORE AT 2-8°C SEAIED WITH DESICCANT.
7.25ML 終止液 (STOP SOLUTION):1瓶 DILUTED SULFURIC ACID SOLUTION (1.0M H2SO4). STORE AT 2~30°C
5.30ML 酵素結合物稀釋液 (CONJUGATE DILUENT):1瓶 PHOSPHATE BUFFERED SALINE SOLUTION CONTAINING SURFACTANT AND HEAT-TREATED NORMAL GOAT SERUM, WITH 0.01% GENTAMICIN AS A PRESERVATIVE. STORE AT 2~8°C

3.1 ML 陰性對照(NON-REACTIVE CONTROL):1瓶 INACTIVATED NORMAL HUMAN SERUM, WHICH IS NON-REACTIVE FOR HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN, ANTIBODIES TO HIV-1/2, HTLV-I/IIAND HEPATITIS C VIRUS. CONTAINS PRESERVATIVES: 0.1% SODIM AZIDE AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN. STORE AT 2~8°C
8.150ML 濃縮洗滌液 (WASH BUFFER CONCENTRATE, 25X):1瓶 A 25 X CONCENTRATE OF PHOSPHATE BUFFERED SALINE WITH SURFACTANT. STORE AT 2~30°C
4.45ML 樣品稀釋液(HTLV-I/II SPECIMEN DILUENT):1瓶 BUFFERED SALT SOLUTION CONTAINING HEAT-TREATED NORMAL GOAT SERUM, CASEIN AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN AD PRESERVATIVES. STORE AT 2~8°C
applicantName: 永信藥品工業股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台中縣大甲鎮中山路一段１１９１號
